description.en: Transform your physical documents into a searchable online archive
description.fr: Système de gestion de documents dématérialisés

steps.content:
services:
  broker:
    image: docker.io/library/redis:7
    restart: unless-stopped
    volumes:
    - ${APP_DATA_DIR}/data/redisdata:/data
  db:
    image: docker.io/library/postgres:16
    restart: unless-stopped
    volumes:
    - ${APP_DATA_DIR}/data/pgdata:/var/lib/postgresql/data
    environment:
      POSTGRES_DB: paperless
      POSTGRES_USER: paperless
      POSTGRES_PASSWORD: paperless
  webserver:
    image: ghcr.io/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx:2.20.6
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
    - 2349:8000
    volumes:
    - ${APP_DATA_DIR}/data/data:/usr/src/paperless/data
    - ${APP_DATA_DIR}/data/media:/usr/src/paperless/media
    - ${DATA_DIR}/storage/paperless/export:/usr/src/paperless/export
    - ${DATA_DIR}/storage/paperless/consume:/usr/src/paperless/consume
    environment:
      PAPERLESS_REDIS: redis://broker:6379
      PAPERLESS_DBHOST: db
      PAPERLESS_TIKA_ENABLED: '1'
      PAPERLESS_TIKA_GOTENBERG_ENDPOINT: http://gotenberg:3000
      PAPERLESS_TIKA_ENDPOINT: http://tika:9998
      PAPERLESS_ADMIN_USER: admin
      PAPERLESS_ADMIN_PASSWORD: ${APP_PASSWORD}
    depends_on:
    - db
    - broker
    - gotenberg
    - tika
  gotenberg:
    image: docker.io/gotenberg/gotenberg:7.10
    restart: unless-stopped
    command:
    - gotenberg
    - --chromium-disable-javascript=true
    - --chromium-allow-list=file:///tmp/.*
  tika:
    image: apache/tika:3.2.3.0
    restart: unless-stopped

en.description: Transform your physical documents into a searchable online archive

fr.description: Système de gestion de documents dématérialisés
